testcase.name: Ticket Booking Process
testcase.system-out: Given User in Adactin login page............................................passed When User enter username and password.......................................passed And User click login button.................................................passed And User select Location,Hotels ,Room Type ,Select Rooms,Check In,Check Out,Adults ,Children,Click Search button,select Hotel,continue,fill FName,LName,Address,CC_no,CC_Type,Expdate,CVV.passed Then User click Booknow and copy Orderno to console.........................passed
